org.jcrom.dao
Class AbstractJcrDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.jcrom.dao.AbstractJcrDAO<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
JcrDAO<T>
public abstract class AbstractJcrDAO<T>
extends Object
implements JcrDAO<T>

An abstract implementation of the JcrDAO interface. This should be extended for specific entity implementations. This class implements all the methods defined in the JcrDAO interface, and provides a few protected methods that are useful for implementing custom finder methods.

The constructor takes a JCR session, so an instance should be created per session. The constructor also takes a Jcrom instance that can be shared across multiple DAOs.

This implementation encapsulates exceptions in JcrMappingException, which is a RuntimeException.

Author:
Olafur Gauti Gudmundsson, Nicolas Dos Santos

Constructor Detail

AbstractJcrDAO

public AbstractJcrDAO(Jcrom jcrom)

Use this constructor when you intend to override the getSession() method to provide your own session management (for example via Guice providers). You can also use the other constructors and just pass null as the session.

The entityClass is retrieved from ParameterizedType in the superclass.

Parameters:
jcrom - the Jcrom instance to use for object mapping

create

public T create(T entity)
Description copied from interface: JcrDAO
Creates a new JCR Node from the object supplied. The path to the parent node will be retrieved from the entity path. A path of "/" means that the entity will be created on root level.

Specified by:
create in interface JcrDAO<T>
Parameters:
entity - the object to be mapped to a JCR node
Returns:
the newly created Object

create

public T create(T entity,
                JcromCallback action)
Description copied from interface: JcrDAO
Creates a new JCR Node from the object supplied. The path to the parent node will be retrieved from the entity path. A path of "/" means that the entity will be created on root level.

Specified by:
create in interface JcrDAO<T>
Parameters:
entity - the object to be mapped to a JCR node
action - callback object that specifies the Jcrom actions:
  • JcromCallback.doAddNode(Node, String, JcrNode, Object),
  • JcromCallback.doAddMixinTypes(Node, String[], JcrNode, Object),
  • JcromCallback.doAddClassNameToProperty(Node, JcrNode, Object),
  • JcromCallback.doComplete(Object, Node),
Returns:
the newly created Object

update

@Deprecated
public T update(T entity,
                           String childNameFilter,
                           int maxDepth)
Deprecated. 

Specified by:
update in interface JcrDAO<T>
Parameters:
entity - the object to be mapped to a JCR node
childNameFilter - comma separated list of names of child nodes to load ("*" loads all, "none" loads no children, and "-" at the beginning makes it an exclusion filter)
maxDepth - the maximum depth of loaded child nodes (0 means no child nodes are loaded, while a negative value means that no restrictions are set on the depth).
Returns:
the updated Object

getAll

public List<T> getAll(String path)
Description copied from interface: JcrDAO
Get all entities from JCR by path (from a @JcrPath field).

getAll

@Deprecated
public List<T> getAll(String path,
                                 String childNameFilter,
                                 int maxDepth)
Deprecated. 

Specified by:
getAll in interface JcrDAO<T>
Parameters:
path - the full path of the entities to be loaded
childNameFilter - comma separated list of names of child nodes to load ("*" loads all, "none" loads no children, and "-" at the beginning makes it an exclusion filter)
maxDepth - the maximum depth of loaded child nodes (0 means no child nodes are loaded, while a negative value means that no restrictions are set on the depth).
Returns:
a list of object instances mapped from the JCR node with the path supplied, or null if no such node was found

resultSize - the number of items to return

findByQOM

protected List<T> findByQOM(javax.jcr.query.qom.Source source,
                            javax.jcr.query.qom.Constraint constraint,
                            javax.jcr.query.qom.Ordering[] orderings,
                            javax.jcr.query.qom.Column[] columns,
                            NodeFilter nodeFilter)
Find JCR nodes with one or more selectors, and map to objects.

Parameters:
source - the node-tuple source; non-null
constraint - the constraint, or null if none
orderings - zero or more orderings; null is equivalent to a zero-length array
columns - the columns; null is equivalent to a zero-length array
nodeFilter - the NodeFilter to apply when updating child nodes and references
Returns:
a list of objects mapped from the nodes

toList

protected List<T> toList(javax.jcr.NodeIterator nodeIterator,
                         NodeFilter nodeFilter)
Maps JCR nodes to a List of JcrEntity implementations.

Parameters:
nodeIterator - the iterator pointing to the nodes
nodeFilter - the NodeFilter to apply when updating child nodes and references
Returns:
a list of objects mapped from the nodes

toList

protected List<T> toList(javax.jcr.NodeIterator nodeIterator,
                         NodeFilter nodeFilter,
                         long resultSize)
Maps JCR nodes to a List of JcrEntity implementations.

Parameters:
nodeIterator - the iterator pointing to the nodes
nodeFilter - the NodeFilter to apply when updating child nodes and references
resultSize - the number of items to retrieve from the iterator
Returns:
a list of objects mapped from the nodes
